Uses of Package
com.fasterxml.clustermate.client.cluster

  • Packages that use com.fasterxml.clustermate.client.cluster 
    Package Description
    com.fasterxml.clustermate.client
    Main public types for ClusterMate client module; most important of which is NetworkClient that is the object application code uses to access data in the logical distributed Store.
    com.fasterxml.clustermate.client.cluster
    Package that contains client-side abstractions that deal with state of server, including rudimentary information about possible server clusters.
  • Classes in com.fasterxml.clustermate.client.cluster used by com.fasterxml.clustermate.client 
    Class and Description
    ClusterViewByClientImpl
    Class that encapsulates view of the cluster, as whole, from client perspective.
  • Classes in com.fasterxml.clustermate.client.cluster used by com.fasterxml.clustermate.client.cluster 
    Class and Description
    ClusterServerNodeImpl
    Value class used by NetworkClient to keep track of state of a single cluster node.
    ClusterViewByClientImpl
    Class that encapsulates view of the cluster, as whole, from client perspective.
